ComicInfo.Title: Here's Negan: Chapter 1; The Kids Are Alright; Comic Lovers 1
ComicInfo.Summary:
Image+ is an all-new monthly magazine featuring Image's upcoming releases, as well as bonus creator-owned comics content. Each issue will be distributed with Diamond's monthly PREVIEWS Catalog and will feature an original, four-page The Walking Dead story concerning Negan's origins, and created by New York Times bestselling team Robert Kirkman and Charlie Adlard, for a total of 48 pages of backstory. Image+ will also showcase interviews, spotlight features, bonus never-before-seen preview pages, editorials from industry voices, and more in-depth, insightful and provocative comics coverage curated by David Brothers, Branding Manager at Image Comics.
Image+ is fans' premier source for all things creator-owned.
*Table of Contents* Front cover: Snotgirl #1 Comic Lovers (IFC) - Story & Art: Brandon Graham Letter From the Publisher - Foreward by Eric Stephenson Marjorie Liu: Breaking New Ground* Chynna Clugston Flores: Rocking Out with Blue Monday* Blue Monday, Vol. 1 - Story / Art: Chynna Clugston Flores / Colors: Jordie Bellaire Bryan Lee O'Malley & Leslie Hung: Fashion, Friends, and Allergies* Snotgirl #1 - Story: Bryan Lee O'Malley / Art: Leslie Hung / Colors: Mickey Quinn / Letters: Maré Odomo Caitlin Kittredge & Steven Sanders: Modern-Day Cold Warriors* Throaways #1 - Story: Caitlin Kittredge / Art: Steven Sanders / Cover: Maiko Kuzunishi / Letters: Rachel Deering Motor Crush - Centerfold artwork by Babs Tarr Jordie Bellaire: Changing Comics One Panel at a Time* A.D.: After Death - Story: Scott Snyder / Art: Jeff Lemire / Letters: Steve Wands Shop Spotlight: Cape & Cowl Comics (Oakland, CA) Industry Perspectives: Creators for Creators - Article by Nick Dragotta Backlist Highlights The Walking Dead: Here's Negan!, Chapter 1 - Story: Robert Kirkman / Art: Charlie Adlard / Gray Tones: Cliff Rathburn / Letterer: Rus Wooton / Editor: Sean Mackiewicz Image Comics July Checklist / Order Form Back cover: "Comics In Your Image" Note: Titles in bold letters denote original content. Titles in bold and italic letters denote exclusive previews and first looks. Asterisks denote interviews. Everything else are articles unless otherwise noted.
